name: Prima Materia
description:
Prima Materia is a puzzle-platformer which came place in the 17e century, in a castle of an alchemist who trying to create a philosopher stone.  It's built on GB Studio, with personnal assets and sprites.

Ideally, I want to release a cartridge version which you can play in old school gameboy (price under 30€), and an executable version for PCs in free price.

I began thinking about this project during the first containment ( in France), and I'm close to the end :

The bêta of the French version is complete at 100% but only musics are missing.

English version is on its way.

Waiting for the last version, I propose this online version in English, which is a demo, so you have 40% of the map, and the plot is not disclosed.

Key control (azerty keyboard):

A = X

B = C

Start = V (not used on demo)

Select = B (not used on demo)
